attributes.action: Parliament must debate the deployment and use of Drones
attributes.additional_details: It is confirmed that in future Drones are to be controlled from the United Kingdom as well as possibly from the United States of America. There must be a full debate in Parliament to identify current and possible future use of Drones. As a weapon which can be deployed and used to kill 'targets' without due process of law then MPs must state categorically how these weapons can be utilized.
